title: The 5 best Amazon deals you can get this Monday
text:
The 5 best Amazon deals you can get this Monday

Get great prices on popular cooking gadgets and more with these deals. (Photo: Reviewed)

— Our editors review and recommend products to help you buy the stuff you need. If you make a purchase by clicking one of our links, we may earn a small share of the revenue. However, our picks and opinions are independent from USA Today’s newsroom and any business incentives.

Happy Monday! There is no better way to start the week than with a good deal. There's just something about getting something you actually want at a great price that makes my heart soar. I mean, if you were going to get it anyway, you might as well save. Right now, you can get incredible prices on robot vacuums, Instant Pots, personal blenders, and more at Amazon. Not only are these good deals, but they're good products (we've tested them ourselves!). Check out all the ways you can save today!

1. $80 off: The best Instant Pot on the market

Cook up a great deal. (Photo: Reviewed / Betsey Goldwasser)

Meal prepping and holiday cooking is so much easier with an Instant Pot. You can easily whip up the a side in the pressure cooker while you have your main meal cooking in the oven. Right now, you can get the 8-quart Instant Pot Ultra for its lowest price ever for today only. This is our favorite electric pressure cooker because it has a simpler dial and screen compared to the popular Duo model, and this larger size is great for feeding a family. It also has extra features like altitude adjustment, cooking indicator, and a steam release reset button.

Get the Instant Pot Ultra 8 Qt 10-in-1 Pressure Cooker for $99.99 (Save $79.96)

2. $70 off: An affordable smart robot vacuum

Combine smart technology and cleaning power—all for a great price. (Photo: Eufy)

During the holiday season, you don't want to waste time constantly vacuuming your floors. Instead have a robot vacuum do the dirty work for you. Plus, you don't have to spend too much on a great one. The Eufy Robovac 30 is a version of the best affordable smart robot vacuum we've ever tested, and right now it's $70 off. We liked the 30C model because it has an intuitive app, magnetic strips to block off spaces, and can be controlled via Amazon Alexa or Google Home Assistant. It's a smart homeowners dream, and you can expect a similar performance with the 30 model.

Get the Eufy BoostIQ Robovac 30 for $199.99 (Save $70)

3. Under $40: The best personal blender we've ever tested

Start your morning right at a great price. (Photo: Reviewed / Jackson Ruckar)

If you need to blend smoothies or make creamy dressings and sauces, you're going to want a powerful blender. But if you have limited counter space, you might want to go with a small personal blender. The Ninja Fit is our favorite personal blender because it's easy to store away, has to-go lids for sipping on-the-go, and was easy to clean up. Right now, you can get it for its lowest price. Plus, it makes a great gift for anyone's whose obsessed with smoothies.

Get the Ninja Personal Blender for $39 (Save $10)

4. 25% off: A can opener for smooth edges

This smoother can opener is a bit safer than your typical one. (Photo: Reviewed / Jackson Ruckar)

If you want a can open that's a little safer (i.e. no rough edges), then this one from OXO is your best bet. After testing a variety of can openers, we found that this one created smooth edges and easily attaches to the tops of cans. That way you won't risk getting sliced by the can lid as you're removing it. Right now, you can get it for $5 off.

Get the OXO Good Grips Smooth Edge Can Opener for $6.89 (Save $4.99)

5. Lowest price: A small, but powerful portable charger

This simple charger is easy to carry around. (Photo: Anker)

Portable chargers are essential for traveling and running errands. If you're exploring a new city, you'll likely be walking around, taking phones, and trying to figure out where you're going. So you don't hit the red zone, take a solid portable charger with me—like this one from Anker. It can charge an iPhone X four times before needing to be recharged itself and has fast charging capabilities. Right now, you can get it for $7 off and its lowest price.

Get the Anker PowerCore 10000 Redux Portable Charger for $26.99 (Save $7)

The product experts at Reviewed have all your shopping needs covered. Follow Reviewed on Facebook, Twitter, and Instagram for the latest deals, reviews, and more.

Prices were accurate at the time this article was published but may change over time.
